pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Ex-Aid's $(l:ex_aid/riders/ex_aid#muteki)Muteki Gamer$(/l)
Obtained by using $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#unfinished_hyper_muteki_gashat)Unfinished Hyper Gashats$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#gamecreator)Game Creator$(/l)

pages.title: Gamedeus Hyper Muteki Gashat
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid: Final Stage (2017, stage show)$(br2)Used to craft Gamedeus Muteki's $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver#gamer_driver_gamedeus_muteki)Gamer Driver (Gamedeus Muteki)$(/l)

pages.title: Hyper Fumetsu Gashat
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Outsiders (2022, web series)$(br2)Used to access Genm's $(l:ex_aid/riders/genm#fumetsu)Hyper Fumetsu Gamer$(/l)

Obtained by using $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#unfinished_hyper_muteki_gashat)Unfinished Hyper Gashats$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#gamecreator)Game Creator$(/l) while having a $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#proto_mighty_action_x_gashat_origin_remake)Proto Mighty Action X Gashat Noir$(/l) in your inventory
